name: AFL.com.au Fix Up
description: Some UI designer at AFL.com.au decided that any time a reader stops scrolling, they aren't just quietly reading, they need the navigation sprung up on them like a bear-trap. This overrides that, securing the top nav in place, and removing the popup footer entirely.
additional_info: It's hacky - probably deserves a Greasemonkey script - but it'll do.
